page.title: 06 The Salmon Fisheries
page.content:
The salmon fisheries are located beside the river to the South of the town of Bushmills.
The purpose of the Fish Farm is to breed salmon and trout as experiments. About 1200 salmon pass up the River Bush. There are 8 people employed and half of them live locally. All the employees are men. There are 6 Industrial workers and 2 Office Staff.
Visiting is made by appointment only and most of the visitors are School Parties which visit in the summer. The Fish Farm opened in 1972 and has a 30 year lease from the Mac Naughten estate.
